text: As the PCN name suggests, it links to you to any park connector to Buangkok Seletar Sengkang AMK Hougang or even YCK. Good wide and long haul loops for sports activity walking running etc. Surrounding is river view.

It’s interesting to explore Lornie road and to link from Ang Mo Kio/Bishan area to Farrer road on bicycle. You’ll have to cross the overhead bridge at the end of Lornie road but there’s a bicycle ramp so it’s not too difficult. You’ll end up behind Adam road market so it’ll be nice to have some fruit juice before setting off again.
Beautiful setting for a long walkabout
A link to ride round the island...
